import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const api="https://techbuggy-1.onrender.com";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError("");try{const res=await fetch("".concat(api,"/api/auth/login"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){setError(data.message||"Login failed");return;}localStorage.setItem("token",data.token);navigate("/");// redirect to home/dashboard
}catch(err){setError("Something went wrong, try again!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white border border-gray-300 shadow-lg rounded-xl p-8 w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-orange-500 mb-6",children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"bg-red-100 text-red-700 p-2 rounded mb-4",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-700 font-semibold",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-400",placeholder:"Enter your email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-700 font-semibold",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-400",placeholder:"Enter your password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-orange-500 text-white py-2 rounded-lg font-semibold hover:bg-orange-600 transition transform hover:scale-105",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600 text-center mt-4",children:["Don\u2019t have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>navigate("/register"),className:"text-blue-600 cursor-pointer hover:underline",children:"Register"})]})]})});};export default Login;
